articles.description: Controlling shareholder of Hollywood group states ‘confidence’ in co-chiefs pitching to keep company private
articles.content: Shari Redstone left investors guessing about the potential sale of Paramount during its annual meeting and instead stated her confidence in the executives who are pitching to keep the Hollywood compa… [+2799 chars]

articles.author: Lukanyo Mnyanda
articles.title: Oil extends losses as Opec+ and weak US data unnerve traders - Financial Times
articles.description: Brent’s 1.4% drop after 4% fall the previous day follows cartel decision to unwind some production cuts
articles.content:
Oil prices extended their losses to a second day on Tuesday, as traders fretted about weak US economic data and news that Opec+ members were ready to raise production.
